fullDescription.intro: Reads the .json file and parses it as JSON value.
fullDescription.option: The path/URL to the file to read (supports remote and .json.gz files too)
Select a part of the read JSON if checked
The part to select from the input JSON. Using JSONPath preferably with a single result. (For multiple results a JSON array will be created around them.)
If checked, execution will fail if no such part found. If unchecked and not found, the result will be a missing value.
When selected, /*...*/ and the line comments //, # are interpreted as comments and get ignored instead of causing errors

ports.outPort: Table with the read JSON values
